clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Obesity and Metabolic Surgery on Chronic Inflammation

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the impact of obesity surgery on chronic inflammation.

detailed_description.textblock: A retrospective study to compare the impact of laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy (LSG), laparoscopic Roux-en Y- gastric bypass (LRYGB) and laparoscopic omega-loop gastric bypass (LOLGB) on chronic inflammation and metabolic syndrome.

primary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
primary_outcome.description: the changing of leucocytes in /nl after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of fatty liver index after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.description: the changing of GOT in U/l, GPT in U/l, GGT in U/l, AP in U/l after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of BMI in kg/m² before and after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of weight before and after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of waist circumference in cm before and after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of HbA1c in % and after obesity surgery

secondary_outcome.time_frame: one day preoperatively and 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month postoperatively
secondary_outcome.description: the changing of c-reactive protein in mg/l after obesity surgery

arm_group.description: patients who underwent laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy (LSG) due to obesity and/or metabolic syndrome
patients who underwent laparoscopic Roux-en-Y- gastric bypass (LRYGB) due to obesity and/or metabolic syndrome
patients who underwent laparoscopic omega-loop gastric bypass (LOLGB) due to obesity and/or metabolic syndrome

intervention.description: Laboratory Examination before, 1 month, 3 month, 6 month and up to 12 month after LSK, LRNYGB, LOLGB

study_pop.textblock: Patients who underwent LSG, LRYGB, LOLGB due to obesity and/or metabolic syndrome

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI > 35kg/m² and obesity-related disease or BMI > 40kg/m²
Exclusion Criteria:
- acute inflammation during laboratory examination
